The work on the right was painted by <image 1>

A. Angelica Kauffmann
B. Peter Paul Rubens
C. Thomas Gainsborough
D. Benjamin West

The work on the right was painted by D. Benjamin West.

This painting is "The Death of General Wolfe," which is a well-known work by Benjamin West.
